## Fine Particle Regression

```{r}
plot_data |> 
  filter(name == "Fine particles (PM 2.5)") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = start_date, y = mean_dv)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) + 
  labs(title = "PM2.5 Levels Throughout NYC Over Time",
       x = "Date",
       y = "Pollutant Level (mcg/m3)")


filtered_data <- plot_data |> 
  filter(name == "Fine particles (PM 2.5)")

model =
  lm(mean_dv ~ start_date, data = filtered_data)

summary(model)
```
